channel.title: Food on him.happyhippos
channel.description: Recent content in Food on him.happyhippos

item.title: Best places (we’ve found) to eat in KWC
item.description: Comfort food Crazy Canuck Crossroads Family Restaurant Hog’s Tail – get the Chicken and Waffles SOS BBQ – amazing fish and chips! Frites Pierogies The Village Eatery Asian Kinkaku Mikey’s Eatery (toast and milk tea and sesame chicken) Bogda Foodie Fruitie – GREAT ramen! Fine(ish) dining Fork and Cork Del’s Enoteca Borealis Langdon Hall Dessert and Drinks Noon Moment Sugar Marmalade
